trans-unit.source: Represents a variable-length stream of binary data to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
trans-unit.target: 表示要儲存在資料庫或從資料庫擷取二進位資料的可變長度資料流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure, setting the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property to the contents of the supplied byte array.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構，設定<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>屬性，以提供的位元組陣列的內容。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The byte array to be stored or retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存或擷取的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates two specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> values to create a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 串連兩個指定<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>值，以建立新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: `x` will appear first in the resulting <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>, followed by `y`.
trans-unit.target: `x`會出現在產生第一個<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>，後面接著`y`。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> that is the concatenated value of x and y.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>的串連的值的 x 和 y。

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object to the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 比較這個<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>物件設為提供<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>物件，並傳回它們的相對值指示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object to be compared to this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>這要比較的物件<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: A signed number that indicates the relative values of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure and the object.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的數字，指出這個相對值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構和物件。

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: 傳回值

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 狀況

trans-unit.source: Less than zero
trans-unit.target: 小於零

trans-unit.source: The value of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object is less than the object.
trans-unit.target: 這個值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>物件是否小於一個物件。

trans-unit.source: Zero
trans-unit.target: 零

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object is the same as object.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>物件是與物件相同。

trans-unit.source: Greater than zero
trans-unit.target: 小於或等於零

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object is greater than object.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>物件是否大於物件。

trans-unit.source: -or- The object is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: -或者-物件為 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object to the supplied object and returns an indication of their relative values.

trans-unit.source: The concatenated values of the x and y parameters.
trans-unit.target: 串連的值 x 和 y 參數。

trans-unit.source: Compares the supplied object parameter to the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 會比較提供的物件參數<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>屬性<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The object to be compared.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> and the two are equal; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件的執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>兩個相等; 否則為也<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構，以判斷它們是否相等。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two values are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果兩個值相等。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If either instance is null, then the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlBinary" name="SqlBinary" href=""></xref> will be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一個執行個體是 null，則<xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlBinary" name="SqlBinary" href=""></xref>將會是 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個雜湊程式碼<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that indicates the XSD of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> ，指出指定的 XSD <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構，以判斷第一個是否大於第二個。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is greater than the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>也就是<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>第一個執行個體是否大於第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否則<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一個執行個體的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>為 null，<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*>的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>將<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"> </xref>。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構，以判斷第一個是否大於或等於第二個。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>也就是<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>第一個執行個體是否大於或等於第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否則<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一個執行個體的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>為 null，<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*>的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>將<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"> </xref>。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否此<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構是 null。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理 Null 值](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the single byte from the property located at the position indicated by the integer parameter, index.
trans-unit.target: 取得從單一位元組整數參數，所指示位置上的屬性 index 。

trans-unit.source: If index indicates a position beyond the end of the byte array, a will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果 index 表示位元組陣列的結尾之外的位置就會引發。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>, always examine the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> property and the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A> property before reading this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免引發<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>，永遠檢查<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A>再讀取這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>

trans-unit.source: The position of the byte to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的位元組位置。

trans-unit.source: The byte located at the position indicated by the integer parameter.
trans-unit.target: 位元組，位於整數參數所指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length in bytes of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得以位元組為單位的長度<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>屬性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>, always examine the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the Length property.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免引發<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>，永遠檢查<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>再讀取 Length 屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>

trans-unit.source: The length of the binary data in the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的二進位資料的長度<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>屬性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The Length property is read when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property contains <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 長度屬性為唯讀時<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>屬性包含<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null"> </xref>。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is less than the second.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構，以判斷第一個是否小於第二個。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>也就是<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果第一個執行個體小於比第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否則<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一個執行個體的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>為 null，<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*>的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>將<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"> </xref>。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>結構。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than or equal to the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>也就是<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>第一個執行個體是否小於或等於第二個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 如果任一個執行個體的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>為 null，<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*>的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>將<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"> </xref>。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構，以判斷它們是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>也就是<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>兩個執行個體是否不相等或<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>兩個執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> that can be assigned to this instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.

trans-unit.target: 這會將轉換<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>. If the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> is null the string will contain "null".
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含<> *> 的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>。如果<> *> 是"null"字串會包含的 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 取得值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising a SqlNullValueException, always examine the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the Value property.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免引發 SqlNullValueException，請一律檢查<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>再讀取 Value 屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: The Value property is read when the property contains <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值屬性唯讀的屬性會包含當<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null"> </xref>。
